title: New: Takykardia – Navigate
content:
There’s a gorgeously regretful elegance to this latest track from Danish outfit Takykardia.

It’s a ballad at heart, steeped in the pain of letting someone down; beautifully produced and delicately composed. Lifted from their debut five track self titled EP, which is released today, it’s all part of a uniquely ambitious and massively exciting first step. Check out Navigate below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
